DOC.brief_summary: To compare pharmacokinetics (PK) of AVP-786 (deuterated [d6] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [d6-DM]/quinidine sulfate [Q]) to AVP-923 (dextromethorphan hydrobromide [DM]/Q) at steady state.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Comparing AVP-786 With AVP-923
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males or females 18 60 years of age BMI 18 32 kg/m2 History or presence of significant disease History of substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse with the past 2 years Use of tobaccocontaining or nicotinecontaining products within 6 months Use of any prescription or the overthecounter medications within 14 days
